Class com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.LicenseManager
Inherited members: ShowHide

com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm

Class LicenseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.LicenseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILicenseManager
    public class LicenseManager extends java.lang.Object implements ILicenseManager
    Default implementation of the ILicenseManager interface. This class should be extended to override the getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset method. For the SDK to pick up the new LicenseManager implementation class an application must replace the meta-data tag named "com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl" and provide the full class name as the value. 
     
 <meta-data tools:replace="android:value"
          android:name="com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl"
          android:value="com.penthera.harness.drm.HarnessLicenseManager"/>

    • Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Static Method and Description
      getInstance 
      static ILicenseManager getInstance(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieve the LicenseManager instance.
      public static ILicenseManager getInstance(android.content.Context context)
      Retrieve the LicenseManager instance. The returned instance is of the class specified in the meta-data tag named com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl in the applications manifest. If the application has not replaced the SDK meta-data then an instance of LicenseManager is returned.
      Parameters:
      context - Context to use for reading the manifest and retrieving the class name.
      Returns:
      Implementation of an ILicenseManager

      getKeyRequestProperties 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getKeyRequestProperties()
      Map of header properties that should be added to the request.
      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getKeyRequestProperties()
      Map of header properties that should be added to the request. This implementation returns a Map with a single entry. The entry sets the Content-Type of the request to application/octet-stream.
      Specified by:
      getKeyRequestProperties in interface ILicenseManager
      Returns:

      getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset 
      java.lang.String getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset(IAsset asset)
      Retrieve the URL for requesting the assets license.
      public java.lang.String getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset(IAsset asset)
      Description copied from interface: ILicenseManager
      Retrieve the URL for requesting the assets license. This method needs to be overridden by customers. It should return the complete URL for requesting the license. That is; it should return the the license server url plus any query parameters that are needed by the licensing server to grant the license.
      Specified by:
      getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset in interface ILicenseManager
      Parameters:
      asset - The asset that needs the license.
      Returns:
      The Url to be used when requesting the license.
